p: H3 isolates were subjected to this ELISA, and the results were all positive (Table 1 and Fig. 3a). H1–H2, H4–H16, NDV, ARV, EDS, FAdV4 and IBV were also assayed by the sandwich ELISA, and the OD 450nm values were all less than the cutoff value; thus, the samples were considered negative (Table 1 and Fig. 3b). Each sample was assayed three times under the same conditions on different days, and the replicate analyses produced very similar results.
